title: Nilakamalam Kundan Ring - Neelam Sobha
materials: 22K Gold setting with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a central uncut Polki Diamond and blue enamel accents. Embellished with surrounding cubic zirconia for enhanced sparkle.
features: This captivating ring draws inspiration from the Neelakamalam (Blue Lotus), showcasing a flower-like design. The intricate Kundan setting showcases a central polki diamond, surrounded by blue enamel segments and cz accents . The arrangement creates a regal and opulent look, perfect for adding a touch of traditional elegance to any ensemble.
occasions: and parties. Can also be worn as a statement piece for special occasions.
description: This ring is a stunning example of Hyderabadi craftsmanship, blending traditional Kundan techniques with a modern aesthetic. The piece is not only visually striking, but also carries cultural significance, making it a cherished heirloom. The use of real Polki diamonds further enhances its value and prestige. Its unique design and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability.
